definition: to divine/to forecast or estimate/(of a place to live etc) to choose

sentences.english: Skin carrot and cut in to pieces. Skin shallots.
sentences.chinese: 红萝卜去皮切块，红葱头去皮保持原粒。

sentences.english: Like carrots, red peppers are also especially helpful in reducing sunburn intensity.
sentences.chinese: 和红萝卜一样，红椒在降低日晒强度方面有显著效果。

sentences.english: I have never thought carrot stick tastes so good.
sentences.chinese: 我没料到红萝卜条味道还不错。

sentences.english: Puss puts some carrots in the bag.
sentences.chinese: 小猫放了一些红萝卜进袋子里。
将青瓜及红萝卜去皮，切丝。
《天使》，小天使是用红萝卜雕刻而成。

sentences.english: Does Henry like carrots and fish for lunch?
sentences.chinese: 亨利喜欢红萝卜和鱼当午餐吗？

sentences.english: Are you carrots, eggs, or coffee?
sentences.chinese: 你是红萝卜，鸡蛋，还是咖啡？

sentences.english: I especially like to cook carrot and pig bone soup.
sentences.chinese: 我最爱煲青红萝卜猪骨汤。

sentences.english: Sliced carrots were added to the soup.
sentences.chinese: 这碗汤里头加了红萝卜切片。

sentences.english: Sweet fruits and carrots can be given in small quantities every few days.
sentences.chinese: 每隔几天可以给少量的甜果子和红萝卜。

sentences.english: Flowers are made of radish and green radish.
sentences.chinese: 花朵则用红萝卜和白萝卜制作完成。

sentences.english: But carrot juice when consumed as such will not be tasty.
sentences.chinese: 但红萝卜汁，当消耗作为这样时不会鲜美。

sentences.english: Put the carrot slices on the plate for decoration.
sentences.chinese: 最后将红萝卜片放入盘中当装饰即可。

sentences.english: Blanch in boiling water until done, drain. Dice the rest of vegetables, blanch carrot and green peas, set aside.
sentences.chinese: 将其余蔬菜切粒，把红萝卜及青豆飞水，备用。

definition: radish (Raphanus sativus), esp. white radish 白蘿蔔|白萝卜[bai2 luo2 bo5]/CL:條|条[tiao2]
cabbage/CL:顆|颗[ke1],個|个[ge4]/Taiwan pr. [gao1 li4 cai4]
variant of 卷心菜[juan3 xin1 cai4]
